summary: The module contains unit test suites that verify the correctness and robustness of the numerical plasma dispersion solvers, specifically for the Hollweg1999 and kinetic Alfvén models. The tests check parameter handling, array input support, result accuracy, exception raising for invalid inputs, output structure conformity, and appropriate warning generation.
business_intent: Provide automated validation to ensure reliable plasma dispersion calculations for scientific research and software quality assurance.
